summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 DODGE RAM 2500. THE CONTACT STATED REFERENCED NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 13V529000 (STEERING) AND STATED THAT THE REQUIRED PART WAS UNAVAILABLE TO PERFORM THE REPAIR. THE DEALER STATED THAT THE PART WOULD NOT BE AVAILABLE UNTIL APRIL OF 2014. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE PROBLEM. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE.
